thread.section_title: Ticketmaster Resale Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ticketmaster Resale | resale.ticketmaster.com.au
thread.title: Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: Thanks Ticketmaster Resale, With only a few days to go before the Bruce Springsteen Perth concert, we realised our group had doubled up on tickets and we had 4 more tickets than we needed. I listed the tickets on Ticketmaster Resale and they were all sold in a couple of days. I received the same amount I paid for the tickets and was therefore very happy with the service. Ticketmaster resale was easy to use, the listing and selling price was clear, and I received the money to my account promptly.
